name: A ZSM file is a sound archive used by various video games, such as X-Men Legends and X-Men Legends II: Rise of the Apocalypse
summary: A ZSM file is a sound archive used by various video games, such as X-Men Legends and X-Men Legends II: Rise of the Apocalypse. It contains compressed .WAV sound files that are referenced during gameplay. ZSM files are not meant to be opened manually by a user.
